ticket.title: request.post? doesn't work
ticket.original-body:
On Rails 3.0.3
routes.rb :
resources :albums do member do match 'dispatch' => 'albums#dispatch', :via => [:get, :post] end end
album controller :
def dispatch logger.info request.post? ? 'yes' : 'no' # Doesn't work logger.info request.method.to_s == 'POST' ? 'yes' : 'no' # Work end
view :
<%= form_for @album, :url => dispatch_album_path(@album) do |f| %> <%= f.text_field :name %> <%= f.submit %> <% end %>
